answers.answer: I have trigger finger in both middle fingers. Right now, I am splinting them every night. When I wake up, they need to be flexed since they are very stiff. Usually that's the first step. If you get no relief, there are steroid injections (which I can't have due to type 2 diabetes; they will make my BS go up too much, according to the dr.)You might want to find a public health clinic where you live that can offer payment plans or sliding scale. Good luck.
